page.title: 13The Longstock Tadpoles
page.content: The{Tadpoles Youth Club}meets at 7:00pm at{Longstock village hall.}The club is for{boys and girls from eight {to eighteen years}old.In summer we do sports like rounders, swimming and running. Every year one group goes to Brockenhurst and the others go to Wales for a weekend.Also the older ones do canoeing. In wales we{climb {mountains}and go{orienteering. In Brockenhurst we go for{walks around the{New Forest.}We cook our own meals. In the{winter}we play indoor games such as{snooker}and{table tennis,}and learn various{crafts,}such as corn dolly making,stone painting,pottery, embroidery and patchwork.{Grown ups}in the village come to the club to{teach us these things.
